Message:
Hordes of sinister creatures
as far as the eye could see...

People fleeing in panic...
Soldiers dying one after another...

These infernal creatures
appeared out of nowhere,
threatening to destroy
the kingdom.

I escaped to safety.
But in that moment,
I noticed Ophelia was
nowhere to be found.

I had a paralyzing feeling that
something terrible was to happen...
However, it was too late.

Ominous lights enveloped
every horde of creatures that
were laying siege to the palace.

I noticed immediately—
That light... It’s... It’s her...!

She transformed into something
that was no longer recognizable
as a human...

All to protect me...
All to protect this country!

I knew my voice
would not reach her,
but I shouted her name
over and over again...
